p: From in vivo experiments, carnosic acid and its ester derivatives were found to be effective in preventing gastric lesions in HCl/EtOH-induced gastric lesions model in mice [ 78]. Also, treatment with rosemary extract of 7,12-dimethylbenz[a]anthracene (DMBA)-induced mammary tumorigenesis in rats, suggested a chemopreventative action for experimental mammary tumorigenesis [ 79].
